description: Offline Google Maps server providing geocoding, place search, directions, and other mapping functionality using a local database
name: Google Maps

tools.description: Convert an address into geographic coordinates

address.description: The address to geocode, e.g., '754 Main St, New York'

tools.name: maps_geocode

tools.description: Convert geographic coordinates into a human-readable address

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate as a string

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate as a string

tools.name: maps_reverse_geocode

address_components.description: Array of address component objects with long_name and types

tools.description: Search for places using a query string

query.description: The search query, e.g., 'restaurant in New York'

tools.name: maps_search_places

results.description: Array of place search results with name, place_id, address, and coordinates

tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific place

place_id.description: The unique identifier for the place, e.g., 'PLACE_0000'

tools.name: maps_place_details

formatted_address.description: The formatted address of the place

opening_hours.description: The opening hours information including periods and weekday_text

phone_number.description: The phone number of the place

rating.description: The average rating of the place

website.description: The website URL of the place

tools.description: Calculate travel distance and time between multiple origins and destinations

destinations.description: List of destination locations as strings

origins.description: List of origin locations as strings

tools.name: maps_distance_matrix

distances.description: Array of distance strings between origins and destinations

durations.description: Array of duration strings between origins and destinations

tools.description: Get elevation data for geographic locations

locations.description: List of location dictionaries with 'lat' and 'lng' keys

tools.name: maps_elevation

elevations.description: Array of elevation values corresponding to the input locations

tools.description: Get directions between two points with optional travel mode

mode.description: Travel mode - driving, walking, bicycling, transit

tools.name: maps_directions

distance.description: The total distance of the route

duration.description: The total duration of the route

steps.description: Array of step objects with description and distance
